title.narrative: Capacity Development and use of Mobile data collection technology-RWANDA

description.narrative: Oxfam Rwanda would like to seek Buffer Funds to implement a two tier project that links programme quality, monitoring, evaluation, learning and accountability with following key interventions: 1. Capacity building programme for partners and staff - Training will be conducted for Oxfam Rwanda partners' and staff to orient them on Common Approach to MEL and Social Accountability (CAMSA). A Monitoring Evaluation and Learning (MEAL) capacity assessment for partners will also be conducted to identify gaps, followed by the development of a MEAL capacity building plan. The capacity building on systematic MEAL will be continuous to reinforce the skills and knowledge amongst partners to enable them to deliver effective programme with impact. The country programme will also establish a learning hub and a platform for convening and sharing as a part of influencing. 2. Using ICT4D in Data collection :Through Iformbuilder mobile platform Technology (https://www.iformbuilder.com/contact -us/) together with IPad devices, Oxfam Rwanda programme will fully deploy ICT4D technology in Data collection and later on in Reporting, form design will be done through Iformbuilder and data will be hosted and accessed at the Oxfam account and IPad Mini 2 with 3G will be used to save money and time spending in Data collection and also Data quality will be granted.
